english.segment1: Focus On What You Want. Focus On Problems You Forgot. I'm Holding On To What I Want. Holding Your Hand
english.segment2: They Say That Everything Must Die. I Say Hold On To What You Want
english.segment3: Unconciously Believing. Decieving Words You Never Said
english.segment4: It's All I Want To Be. All I Wanted To Do. Is Give You The World. All I Ask Is Please Believe In Me
